summary: This bill, the Military Consumer Protection Task Force Act of 2025, establishes an interagency task force to combat financial fraud targeting members of the Armed Forces, veterans, and military families. The task force, composed of representatives from various federal agencies and non-governmental organizations, will identify fraudulent schemes, collect data on financial challenges, evaluate existing programs, and develop recommendations to prevent and combat financial fraud. The task force will report its findings and recommendations to relevant congressional committees annually.
